extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Completed 60.0 or more units.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from PHIL303; COMM338.

basic.description: An examination of the moral principles involved in the evaluation of business institutions, practices and decisions. Sample topics include: liberty, efficiency and the free market ideal; the market and justice in distribution.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Ethics and Business
